snippet: The horse, which recently tested positive for a powerful painkiller, died Thursday at a New Mexico racetrack after winning a trial heat for one of the world’s richest horse races.
abstract: Jess A Zoomin, one of eight quarter horses in New Mexico that tested positive for the painkiller dermorphin, breaks down and is euthanized after winning a trial heat at a New Mexico race track.

byline.original: By WALT BOGDANICH and REBECCA R. RUIZ

lead_paragraph: The horse, which recently tested positive for a powerful painkiller, died Thursday at a New Mexico racetrack after winning a trial heat for one of the world’s richest horse races.

headline.seo: Horse Given Painkiller Breaks Down at New Mexico Racetrack
headline.main: Horse Given Painkiller Breaks Down at New Mexico Racetrack
headline.print_headline: Deadly End for Horse That Tested Positive for Painkiller
